content.rendered:
Help Us Win Best of the Best!

Once again, we have been nominated for the Macon Telegraph’s Best of the Best awards this year! Please take a minute to click on the links below and vote for Gottwals Books as Best Book Store. You can vote once per day for BOTH Macon and Warner Robins, so vote for us multiple times between now and April 30th!

Warner Robins: http://bit.ly/2oIXmAT
Macon: http://bit.ly/2oROcUF

 

Teachers Get 25% OFF

We want to thank our teachers for the hard work they put into our kids this year. From May 8th to May 12th, teachers get 25% OFF (instead of the normal 10% discount) used books and educational toys. This offer includes homeschool teachers as well! This discount cannot be combined with any other credit, discounts, or offers.

 

Teacher Appreciation EVENT is May 9th

On Tuesday, May 9th, we’re inviting teachers to our second annual Teacher Appreciation Event! This is a drop-in event for our teachers from 6-7:30 p.m. in our Macon and Warner Robins stores. The stores will be closed to other customers at that time. EVERY teacher (again, including homeschool teachers!) who attends the event will receive a FREE $10 gift card! We will provide soft drinks and have prize drawings throughout the night.
